title: chandram baja
sahitya:
candram bhaja maanasa saadhu hrudaya sdrush.am

(candram)



anupallavi



indraadi lOkapaalEDita taarEsh.am

indum shODash.a kalaadharam nish.aakaram

indiraa sahOdaram soodhaakara manish.am

(candram)



caraNam



sh.ankara mowLi vibhooshaNam sh.eeta kiraNam caturbhujam

madana cchatram kshabaakaram venkaTEsh.a nayanam

viraaN manO jananam vidhum kumuda mitram

vidhi guruguha vaktram

sh.ash.aangam geeshpati sh.aabaanugraha paatram

sh.arash.candrikaa dhavaLa prakaash.a gaatram

kankaNa keyoora haara makuTaadi dharam

pankaja ripum rOhinee priyakara caturam

(candram)
